page.title: 11HOUSING IN GROVE
page.content: GROVE WAS A VERY SMALL VILLAGE 20 YEARS AGO. BUT NOW GROVE HAS INCREASED A LOT. GROVE IS THE 2nd BIGGEST VILLAGE IN EUROPE. IT IS NEARLY AS BIG AS WANTAGE. WE HAVE 2 LARGE ESTATES. SEMI DETACHED HOUSES ARE MOST COMMON IN GROVE. TERRACED HOUSES ARE QUITE COMMON BUT NOT AS COMMON AS SEMI DETACHED HOUSES.FLATS ARE NOT AS COMMON AS ANY TYPE OF HOUSE. THE MOST COMMON APPLIANCES USED IN HOMES ARE OVENS,HOOVERS,TVs,FRIDGES, FREEZERS, VIDEOS, AND MANY THINGS LIKE THIS.MOST HOMES HAVE A GARDEN AND A GARAGE. THE NEW HOUSES ARE BUILT OUT OF BRICK WITH TILED ROOFS.SOME PREFABRICATED HOUSES ARE BEING BUILT. THERE ARE STILL SOME OLD THATCHED COTTAGES IN THE VILLAGE. BY LYNDSEY AND JENNY.
